channel.title: EMPIRE STATE
channel.itunes:author: Rufus Ho
channel.description: Short animated films to an original techno soundtrack. These introduce EMPIRE STATE, a fictional city that is a cross between Los Angeles, Tokyo and Mars; where mythology exists along side truth and where traditional good and evil are reversed. 12 Assassins are introduced - each using a different weapon - and there is only one main target, the Devil himself.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Music
